statements.statement: select THE.*, THE.THETHANHVIEN_ID as LOAITHANHVIEN_ID, THE.TENTHETHANHVIEN as TENLOAITHANHVIEN from TM_CSKH_THETHANHVIEN THE where THE.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' and (THE.TAMNGUNG = '0' or THE.TAMNGUNG is null) and trunc(SYSDATE) > trunc(THE.THOIGIANBANTHE) order by THE.THETHANHVIEN_ID

select THE.*, THE.THETHANHVIEN_ID as LOAITHANHVIEN_ID, THE.TENTHETHANHVIEN as TENLOAITHANHVIEN from TM_CSKH_THETHANHVIEN THE where THE.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' and (THE.TAMNGUNG = '0' or THE.TAMNGUNG is null) order by THE.THETHANHVIEN_ID
